name: Classic Beginner
author: curator
description: A gentle introduction. Solvable with naked singles only.

name: Morning Warm-up
author: curator
description: Perfect for your morning coffee. Easy naked singles throughout.

name: Pointing Pairs
author: curator
description: Requires naked pairs and pointing pairs. Good daily practice.

name: Hidden Pairs
author: curator
description: Hidden pairs technique required. A satisfying solve.

name: monolith_001
author: curator
description: A classic symmetrical puzzle requiring advanced techniques to crack.

name: xwing_practice
author: curator
description: Specifically designed to practice X-Wing detection.

name: ywing_showcase
author: curator
description: Y-Wing and X-Wing required. Not for the faint-hearted.

name: swordfish_master
author: curator
description: Swordfish technique required for completion. Expert challenge.
